channel.title: Release on Rulehunter - Find simple rules in your data to meet your goals
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Rulehunter - Find simple rules in your data to meet your goals

item.title: Rulehunter v0.3 Released
item.description: The third official version (second publicized version) of Rulehunter has been released. Please see the CHANGELOG for details. Highlights include: Restructure of the experiment files Include a web server Reduce memory usage

item.title: Rulehunter v0.1 Released
item.description: The first official version of Rulehunter has been released. It is fully functional and has been tested on Linux and Windows. It is available to install and run immediately.
